text:
3
Perhaps the NAEB's most far-reaching association is its membership
in the International Radio and Television Advisory Council,, The
recently formed, 12-member group is working for the interchange of
the most outstanding exportable radio and television programs
throughout the free world* It is said to be the first such organized
effort in radio and TV history*
The association can help advance one of radio's still brightest prospects
the prospect of free peoples speaking to free peoples*
J. B,
